name: Ramp Potatoes
author: cookin'mama08
summary: In the springtime, I always look forward to making ramp potatoes. If you've never had a ramp, you are missing out! A member of the leek family, they have a taste like garlic, onion, and a little something special!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until beginning to soften, about 10 minutes; drain
Heat bacon drippings in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir potatoes in the hot drippings until golden brown, about 15 minutes
Stir ramps and bacon with the potatoes; season with salt and black pepper
Continue cooking until the ramps are soft, about 5 minutes
